case_title: MUHAMMAD SIDDIQ AND ANOTHER vs MUHAMMAD AFZAL AND ANOTHER

facts.charges: Assault under section 452 P. P. C.
facts.compromise_attempt: Initiated by relatives and brotherhood (biradary) of the parties

arguments.petitioners: Case fit for quashment under section 561-A Cr. P. C. due to lack of complainant support
arguments.state_counsel: Case has sufficient evidence including eyewitnesses; non-compoundable offences cannot benefit from sections 561-A or 494 Cr. P. C.

observations: District Magistrate is not the trial court
Complainant can reinitiate withdrawal petition in proper forum
Trial Magistrate has discretion under the law
